title: Initial Concept Delta Platform Setup

requirements.text: Create routing structure with six pages: Home (/), Dashboard (/dashboard), Admin (/admin), About (/about), Test with dynamic ID parameter (/test/:id), and Result with dynamic ID parameter (/result/:id). All pages should be empty placeholders initially.

quotes: Create these pages (empty for now): / → Home /dashboard /admin /about /test/:id /result/:id

acceptanceCriteria: All six routes are defined and accessible
Dynamic routes for /test/:id and /result/:id accept and parse ID parameters
Each route renders a distinct placeholder component

requirements.text: Implement a responsive Navbar component with left side containing the Delta logo (from uploaded photo_2026-02-19_19-46-20.jpg processed as a transparent, optimized header image) and 'Concept Delta' text, right side containing navigation links for Home, About, and Login (placeholder), and a mobile hamburger menu that reveals navigation links on smaller screens.

quotes: Left side: Delta logo 'Concept Delta' Right side: Home About Login (placeholder for now) Mobile: Hamburger menu

acceptanceCriteria: Navbar displays Delta logo and 'Concept Delta' text on the left
Home, About, and Login links are visible on the right on desktop
Hamburger menu appears on mobile screens and toggles navigation visibility
Navbar uses the uploaded logo image after processing

requirements.text: Establish the branding color scheme using Primary Navy (#1e3a8a) and Light Blue Accent (#60a5fa) with white background sections throughout the application. Create a reusable gradient button component that transitions from navy to light blue.

quotes: Colors: Primary Navy: #1e3a8a Light Blue Accent: #60a5fa White background sections Gradient button component: Navy → Light blue

acceptanceCriteria: Color scheme is consistently applied across all pages
Gradient button component exists and can be reused
Button gradient flows from navy (#1e3a8a) to light blue (#60a5fa)

requirements.text: Create a Footer component containing 'Concept Delta © 2026' copyright text, 'COEPian Initiative' text, and placeholder links/icons for YouTube and Telegram social channels.

quotes: Include: Concept Delta © 2026 COEPian Initiative text YouTube / Telegram placeholders

acceptanceCriteria: YouTube and Telegram placeholder links or icons are present

requirements.text: Design and implement a Hero Section for the Home page with a big heading stating 'practice MHT-CET with real exam level mock tests', subtext reading 'Free practice tests designed by COEPians', and a prominent CTA button labeled 'Start Free Test' using the gradient button component. Keep the design minimal and uncluttered.

quotes: Big heading: 'practice MHT-CET with real exam level mock tests' Subtext: 'Free practice tests designed by COEPians' Big CTA button: 'Start Free Test' Keep it minimal. No clutter.

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays the exact heading 'practice MHT-CET with real exam level mock tests'
Subtext 'Free practice tests designed by COEPians' is visible below the heading
CTA button labeled 'Start Free Test' uses the gradient button component
Hero section design is minimal with no visual clutter

constraints: Use only React with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and React Query for the frontend
Do not modify immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Full authentication system (Login is placeholder only)
Functional test or result pages beyond routing structure
Real integration with YouTube or Telegram APIs

edits: Remove background, make transparent, and optimize for header use (photo_2026-02-19_19-46-20.jpg > delta-logo.dim_200x80.png)
